title: IF I GET TO GOLD IN FLEX AND UNRANKED IN SOLO. WHEN I PLAY NORMALS, WILL I GET THE BORDER FOR GOLD??
body:
Exactly what I said
The title is self-explanatory  
?_?

replies.body: Currently, your normals would reflect your best border from either dynamic or ranked per the [Preseason FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/231832207-Preseason-FAQ).  We don't have any news or updates for rewards regarding this season, though.  Bookmark our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page when we draw closer to the end of the season for info on borders.  Hang tight, and good luck!
You get the border the season after I think
